thread.title: BRIEF-Quality Care Properties Says To Receive Reverse Termination Fee Of $250 Mln If Promedica Fails To Acquire HCR Manorcare In Bankruptcy Proceeding

title: BRIEF-Quality Care Properties Says To Receive Reverse Termination Fee Of $250 Mln If Promedica Fails To Acquire HCR Manorcare In Bankruptcy Proceeding

organizations.name: promedica fails to acquire hcr manorcare in bankruptcy proceeding reuters

text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Quality Care Properties Inc:
* QUALITY CARE PROPERTIES - CO TO RECEIVE REVERSE TERMINATION FEE OF $250 MILLION IF PROMEDICA FAILS TO ACQUIRE HCR MANORCARE IN BANKRUPTCY PROCEEDING
* QUALITY CARE PROPERTIES - QCP TO PAY WELLTOWER TERMINATION FEE OF $19.8 MILLION IF QCP TERMINATES DEAL TO ACCEPT A SUPERIOR PROPOSAL Source text: [ bit.ly/2HspTqJ ]
